name: Creole Tilapia
author: Cheri
summary: A great way to prepare any white fish fillets you may have on hand. A side of Mexican-style rice is a wonderful enhancement to the meal.
ingredients: 4  Roma tomatoes, diced, or more to taste
1 pinch Creole seasoning, or to taste
½ cup shredded Mexican cheese blend
directions: Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C)
Layer bell peppers, tomatoes, onion, cilantro, jalapeno pepper, and garlic in a baking dish
Drizzle olive oil over mixture; add juice from 1 lime and mix well
Arrange fish fillets over mixture and season with Creole seasoning
Sprinkle Mexican cheese blend over fish and add remaining lime juice
Bake in the preheated oven until fish flakes easily with a fork, about 40 minutes
